model.name: ONCE Scenario Storage Organization
model.title: ONCE Scenario Storage Organization
model.description: Server writes its scenario in organized directory structure: /scenarios/reverseDomain/component/version/uuid.scenario.json (e.g., /scenarios/local/once/ONCE/0.1.0.2/someUUID.scenario.json). This creates a hierarchical storage system that prevents naming conflicts and enables component discovery by domain and version.
